abstracts.cdata!:
The Fifth Industrial Imports Project
            will enable selected priority industries in India to
            maintain and expand their production of capital goods and
            agricultural chemicals by financing part of their
            requirements of foreign exchange for the import of raw
            materials, components, spare parts and miscellaneous items
            of manufacturing equipment. The foreign exchange is sold by
            the Government of India to the ultimate beneficiaries.
